title.rendered: Hivency influencer platform launches in the italian market

content.rendered:
Hivency, the leading SaaS platform for influencer marketing in Europe, announces its launch in the Italian market. Brands will be able to run campaigns with Italian influencers and launch consumer review campaigns. Influencers will have access to the platform and will be offered collaborations with their favorite Italian and international brands.

After expanding our activities in Spain and Germany, we wanted to accelerateour development in Italy. It is a market with an ideal level of maturity for a SaaS dedicated to influence and for which we had many customers who wanted to be accompanied.” explains Dorian Ciavarella, co-founder and CEO of Hivency.

As a growing platform, Hivency will first open offices in Italy and then recruit five new talents in order to offer the best support to its customers and users. Today, nearly 12,000 Italian influencers are already connected, and many brands are already launching campaigns with them, including photo printing app PhotoSì.

The influencer platform founded in 2017 and headquartered in Paris in France is also present in Spain and Germany. In addition to these three countries, more than 150,000 micro-influencers and 250,000 nano-influencers are spread across 140 countries, offering multiple collaboration opportunities for brands and users of the platform.

Press release – Paris, Tuesday, September 21, 2021
